Class.name: EasyCSP.Views.Site.Closed
Class.Description: This page is displayed when a new user successfully registers with the system. The page will contain a link to click to activate the new account. The user will not be allowed to log in until activation has been done.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
set ..pageTitle = "Site is Closed" do ..addContent("

The site is currently closed for maintenance. We are working as quickly as possible to resolve any issues. Please try your request again later.

")
